questions.body: On a scale of 1-5, how anxious do you expect to feel in class? (1 = not at all anxious, 5 = extremely anxious)
On a scale of 1-5, how bored do you expect to feel in class? (1 = not at all bored, 5 = extremely bored)
On a scale of 1-5, how much do you expect to feel enjoyment in class? (1 = no enjoyment at all, 5 = maxiumum enjoyment)
